sections.heading: of the First Class Firefighters Retirement Act, how cited; applicability
sections.text: (1) Sections 16-1020 to 16-1042 shall be known and may be cited as the Cities of the First Class Firefighters Retirement Act.(2) Except as provided in section 16-1039, sections 16-1020 to 16-1038 shall apply to all firefighters

16-1020.Cities of the First Class Firefighters Retirement Act, how cited; applicability.

(1) Sections 16-1020 to 16-1042 shall be known and may be cited as the Cities of the First Class Firefighters Retirement Act.

(2) Except as provided in section 16-1039, sections 16-1020 to 16-1038 shall apply to all firefighters of a city of the first class.

SourceLaws 1983, LB 531, ยง 1;Laws 2024, LB686, ยง 1.
